# <i class="fas fa-glasses"></i>About {-}
In this website are available the data and scripts used in the manuscript [*Multi-trait selection for mean performance and stability of maize hybrids in mega-environments delineated using envirotyping techniques*](https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2022.1030521)


# <i class="fas fa-code"></i>How to reproduce? {-}

* [Download data](https://github.com/TiagoOlivoto/paper_maize_huanghuaihai/archive/refs/heads/master.zip)
* Open the `*.Rmd` files in RStudio.
* Optionally change functions and arguments.
* Re-build the document to see the changes.
